name: the DOG //demo
description:
early access

You are the DOG

Your nose and ears tell you where to go. The trees are enormous, birds chirp in the bushes, and the thick grass hides secret messages. But how can you discover all of this when the human keeps calling you?

Peaceful walks with your human are nice. Yet after some time, even the goodest dog gets the call for adventure, to run away into the unknown. Who knows what you will find there.

Featuring: 

  • Barking
  • Getting pats
  • Catching birds

---

Hardware requirements:

Quite decent but with some FPS drops ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Laptop  Windows 10
Graphic  NVIDIA GeeForce 860M
CPU  Intel Core i7 47710HQ
RAM  8gb

 

The best DOG experience 

PC  Windows 10
Graphic  NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
CPU  Intel Core i5 10500
RAM  16gb
